entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
